mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wechat_users (open_id, nickname, head_url, name, id_card_type, id_card, phone_number, organization_code, status, is_delete, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{openId}, #{nickname}, #{headUrl}, #{name}, #{idCardType}, #{idCard}, #{phoneNumber}, #{organizationCode}, #{status}, #{isDelete}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select a.*, b.coupon_code, b.start_time, b.end_time, b.coupon_type, b.coupon_status, DATE_FORMAT(b.start_time, '%y年%m月%d日%H:%i:%s') as state_date, DATE_FORMAT(b.end_time, '%y年%m月%d日%H:%i:%s') as end_date from wechat_users a left join coupon_detailed b on a.id = b.user_id where a.is_delete = 1 and b.is_delete = 1 and a.open_id = #{openId} ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 1
